wikipedia_page.main: Charles James Francis Sinclair    (born 4 April 1948) is a British businessman. He is the chairman of Associated British Foods.

response: *  Charles Sinclair, businessman, Warden of Winchester College 2014–2019
*Charles Sinclair, chairman of Associated British Foods.
Charles Sinclair or St Clair is the name of:
*Charles Sinclair (screenwriter) of The Green Slime and Batman television episodes
*Charles Sinclair, character in Aces: Iron Eagle III
